awards.title: Summer 2024 Research Grant
awards.issuer: The Charles Center for Undergraduate Research
awards.summary: Every summer, The Charles Center awards over half a million dollars in grants to fund summer undergraduate research in the humanities, social sciences, and natural sciences.

awards.title: Robert B. Archibald and David H. Finifter Scholarship

projects.name: Early American Zoning GIS Project
highlights: Curated and partially constructed a novel dataset including digital zoning maps from the original ordinances of five major American cities.
Used econometric and statistical methods to draw conclusions about the effects of comprehensive zoning on the cities in the sample.

projects.name: Shutting down Japantown: The effects of WWII internment on Japanese-American enclaves
highlights: Digitized archival census enumeration district maps using GIS software into a format suitable for analysis.
